help:
Hi, I'm bucket. 👋

I'm a computer and I live in the cloud.

You can program me!
You can use $USER or $RANDOM to put a username in the response.

Say 'bucket help commands' for more.

You can talk to me in private too.
example: Try typing: IF bottom THEN oh no, thats rude!
commands:
'bucket no more XXX': I wont react to that anymore.

'give bucket XXX': I can hold 30 things

'bucket give XXX a present': I can give away my things

'bucket shut up XX': I can be quiet for XX minutes
